title: SOURCE Spirit of encroachment in farewell address

content.question: In what respect does the Constitution address Washington’s concern regarding the “spirit of encroachment” expressed in the excerpt?

choices.label: The Constitution distributes power across national institutions.
The Constitution provides for equal representation of all citizens in Congress.
The Constitution requires a simple majority vote in Congress to overturn a veto.
The Constitution requires the Supreme Court to approve all legislation.

content.answer: The Constitution distributes power across national institutions.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how the argument or perspective in the source relates to political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
